note.title: Julius Caesar must survive
note.text: Julius Caesar must survive in order for Alesia to fall.

note.title: Capture Alesia
note.text: Capture all townhalls in the stronghold of Alesia.

note.title: The final attack
note.text: The Gaul reinforcements have been destroyed! Now concentrate on Alesia.

note.title: Hold the siege
note.text: You must not allow any of your camps to fall in enemy hands for long.

note.title: Gaul reinforcements
note.text: Stand your ground until the Gaul reinforcements cease.
